pages.title: Rumor (Lucky Demon)
pages.text: $(o)Do you believe in luck? Well, even if you don't, this one exists.$(br2)There is an entity known as the Lucky Demon in an unkown dimension.

$(o)This creature is responsible for bringing good or bad luck to each creature of this world.$(br2)$(o)To summon this creature, first you have to craft a Devil's Ante.$(br2)$(o)Finally you have to right click while you are holding the Devil's Ante on your hand.
